name: [LD33] Benched
description:
Be the biggest asshole you can be!

Click on people passing by and choose which insult you think is best to gain points!

Don't forget to post your gross thoughts to Twatter™ for bonus points!

Art By: Mario Castaneda (@wrackune)

Code By: Jennifer B. (@magicnanners) & Chris Jennewein (@kinkofer)

Vote on our Ludum Dare 33 entry here!

I've only tested the Windows build but the OSX and Linux builds should work just fine. If you encounter any issues message me on twitter or fromfiregames@gmail.com and I'll try to get it sorted out for you.
